[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@lint-package-json/core](./core.md) &gt; [DEFAULT\_CONFIG](./core.default_config.md)

## DEFAULT\_CONFIG variable

Linter default configuration of type [Config](./core.config.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DEFAULT_CONFIG: LinterConfig
```

## Remarks

This is the configuration which will be loaded by the linter before overloading its properties with another optional custom configuration.
